account.descriptionLink:
I propose we raise the minimum required Kin bag for submitting a proposal in this DAO from the current 10,000 KIN to 1,000,000 KIN. 

Increasing this threshold may help keep away bots and trolls; we can always change this again after more discussion. This is simply a proposal for the Kin community to begin our DAO journey. 

Kin is the only truly decentralised, ultra-efficient, and fully distributed commodity in the world.
account.name: Update Realms Config for "Kin DAO" - FIRST PROPOSAL / TEST
